website_summaries.verdict: Skip the typical popsicle mold and opt for these tube-shaped mold bags to make healthy frozen snacks.
pros: Comes with collapsible funnel for easy filling, kids will have a blast making and eating
Freeze fast and easy to hold
cons: Some bags may spurt leaks at seams, zipped top may not always align or seal correctly

customer_reviews.title: Honest Abe
customer_reviews.text: My first review I was quite disappointed in this product. Three days following that post I received a new pack of Frozip bags and a letter from the founder. This Founder has confidence in his product and appreciation for his customers. The funnel is fabulous eliminating the mess of filling the bags. Testing the first 15 bags with water, no leaks. The next 12 with a yogurt mix, no leaks. So what do I say now?? Frotabulous! I have no doubt I will order more before this summer is over! Thank you Abe!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to Replace Gogurts!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how amazing these are. I ordered these to replace the gogurts in my kids lunches and they love these so much more. I haven’t had issues with any of them leaking, there is an easy to read fill line, and it comes with a funnel. I make pineapple flavors, strawberry banana, even s’mores...and they are all natural and vegan most of the time. I feel much better controlling the ingredients, definitely an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Think i should be resent better bags disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed all the bags in each 5 pack of 125 was defective all had leak on the sides of plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these they said they were 8in long. As you can see they are almost 8inch but you can only fill about 6inches. Quality is cheap as well, super thin plastic. Probably wouldn't order again. Best part is the quality of the silicone funnel. Update to first review: One star is as low as it will let me go. I have used these and they leak SO bad! The ziploc is useless. I would never recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Results
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the little funnel that came with this product. Unfortunately the bags themselves are not as well made as I would have expected. Many of them leaked at the side seam. The ones that were successful, froze well and the created Popsicle came out of the bag quite easily. I am mixed--I like the idea of making my own but I want the bags to be better made.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyjw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While I'm eager to make some juice and yogurt pops for my kiddos, let's be real... I'm even more eager to make some Vodka pops first for the 4th of July! 🤣 Living in Texas we can't get Costco's infamous vodka pops in store because of the blue laws. Soooo, I'm trying my own. So far they've been super easy to use! I mixed my drinks in a glass first then using the provided funnel I poured them into the bags. I can't report yet on whether they leak like others have experienced so I'll report back later once they've had some time in the freezer but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I ordered these, what a fun idea! I agreed to make 100 “popsicles” for a family reunion that is actually today. Yesterday I began making the treats. Nearly half of the bags were not completely sealed at the seems, making the worst stickiest mess in my kitchen. I will also now not be able to fulfill my promise of making the 100 healthy frozen treats for the party! I am very disappointed in the lack of quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I make my own health food smoothies in the blender and then freeze them. This allows me to make larger quantities, but is also great in that all I have to do for breakfast in the morning is grab one from the freezer! They are BPH and Phthalate free, but cheap enough that I don't feel guilty throwing them away. I read some reviews that said the bags leaked or broke, but I've gone through all 125 bags and have yet to find a single one that leaked or broke. Will definitely be ordering these again!
customer_reviews.author: klb503

customer_reviews.title: The best way to make healthy popsicles
customer_reviews.text: I have been a popsicle lover longer than I can remember and over the years, I have used those plastic popsicle molds. Although I am an advocate for not using unnecessary plastic items, these popsicle mold bags have been extremely useful for my husband and I. We made frozen fruit popsicles as well as used them for smoothies because they are easy to eat on the go! It's a way to also give your children a sweet treat that isn't full of dyes, syrups and other ingredients that aren't conducive to maintaining a healthy balance. I will continue to purchase these molds as needed and would highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary VanOostenbrugge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome , you won’t regret them
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for ! Mama has her own popsicles for this nice summer days.. or any day lol
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use  and the kids will love them!
customer_reviews.text: I make yogurt for our family, but the children still love their GOgurt, I decided to try and use pouches and make my own gogurts. The pouches hold 4 ounces of yogurt (or whatever you use them for) and the funnel that is included is the perfect measuring device as if you fill it to the top it is 4 ounces, so no need for additional measuring cups etc. You can just spoon in your filling and voila!
customer_reviews.author: jcaba

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Defrosted lemon juice tasted like Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Needed something for my lemon juicing. Update: the bags were great and worked well, unfortunately I don’t like the taste of plastic! After the lemon juice defrosted it tasted like sour lemon plastic! I am very disappointed with the quality of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pops
customer_reviews.text: The Frozip popsicle bags are so very easy to use and they make it fun to create healthy pops for my family. My grandchildren love the fresh strawberry, peach or watermelon pops. I simply puree the fresh fruit in my blender and pour the mixture into the pops and freeze. The pops take up little freezer space and are ready to enjoy after a few hours of freezing. I am so happy to have discovered Frozip and if I was new mommy, I would puree vegetables and fruits and freeze in bags for later use for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Irissa

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, with modification.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea that can include healthy choices for home made frozen treat. That bags do seal well and can be reused. The kids have complained, and I've verified, the square corners on the bag tend to cause pain, irritation and cut the corners of the mouth inside. I suppose there may be user malfunction to an extant due to sticking the bag in the mouth instead of pushing the ice out and biting it off, but it still hurts. Using scissors to round the edges takes care of the problem and makes opening the bag easier as well. 5 stars if they change the design to rounded corners.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus304

customer_reviews.title: More than half the bags leak....
customer_reviews.text: The funnel is very cool. However, the bags leak very badly. More than half of twenty bags I tried were unusable. I threw them out and tried to find decent ones in the batch. What a mess. I have a new fridge/freezer and this is unacceptable. I placed the ones that weren't leaking in a cup and hopefully the seams don't break. I haven't tried any other bags, but I'll probably give it a shot. I'll add that I filled the bags with grape juice. Maybe if you filled it with something thicker, like yogurt it wouldn't leak. But I do not recommend this for juice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and cheaper than store bought popsicles
customer_reviews.text: Loved not only this product, but y'all the customer service of this company is impeccable. I bought this, didn't realize it was a third party seller. Was emailed about my purchase. The funnel is perfect size for not only these popsicle bags, but for other tiny needs. I've made grape(straight up juice) strawberry lemonade(water fresh strawberries and true lemon) and tropical coconut( coconut cream, water and tropical frozen fruit with a dash of stevia) will be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are easy enough to use. Place the funnel inside and pour the liquid to the line. They work well for the most part. I just feel like the plastic is a little soft for my liking. I wish it was a little sturdier, like the store bought ice pops. It also helps if you cut the top off when you’re ready to eat them. Even though there is a zipper top, this helps to keep it open. The zipper top tends to snap shut as you’re trying to eat it if you don’t cut this off. These also do not fit in those neoprene ice pop sleeves, so don’t bother buying those to go with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mel KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them and it's getting them to eat fruit they ...
customer_reviews.text: We started using these right away to make our own freezies, using frozen fruit and water. The kids love them and it's getting them to eat fruit they don't normally eat. I love them because I can zip them back up and put them back in the freezer if there is still some left. You can reuse these if you wash them out - the plastic is sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: karma80love

customer_reviews.title: Cool! Homemade pops!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved how easy these bags are to use! I really love popsicles, but the crazy sugar content makes them tough to rationalize. Having the option to use these to make pops, especially on a hot day, is really cool :) I have also started using them for other things like nuts and yoghurt - very nice to have in my backpack. I only have one suggestion / request for the manufacturer: have you exlored making these out of biodegradable material instead of plastic? I love these, so not complaining! But we all know how much havoc plastics are wreaking on our beaches and oceans, and it would be super cool if these would not add to that.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like that all 125 come in a ziplock pouch the size of your hand. The funnel will be useful for more than popsicle making. I really wanted gatorade zero popsicles and finally decided to make it happen. In 20 minutes I filled 45ish pouches. Each pouch seems to hold about 4oz of liquid. No mess, no breaking, delicious. I do wish there was a reusable version of this because I feel bad for using all the plastic. Until I find that, these are a really great option. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Edington

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!!!! Please don't buy it. It was a horrible experience for me. I bought it to make icepop for my baby. My first impression is that it is very soft, easy to make icepop and also looks very hygienic. But when I tried it, it was terrible! the plastic made my throat bitter. I ate it in the morning and by 5 pm my throat was still bitter and I even felt very tired! Imagine what happens when your children eat them? really bad. I don't even know if this will affect my health later on. every body! Please read the product carefully before buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Tram

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were going through freezie pops like crazy so I figured I would give these a try. We were buying Juicy Juice brand freezie pops so I figured it would be cheaper and just as easy to fill our own with juice. They worked like a charm! I'm excited to see what else we can use them for (yogurt, smoothies, etc.). Nice healthy alternative and very easy to use. I thought it would be difficult to pour into the funnel and hold the tube at the same time, but it wasn't difficult at all. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Langston

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over my freezer
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use these for the first time. I usually make big alcoholic frozen drinks in the bigger zip pouches but these were a great option for smaller stronger adult popsicles. I was super careful in making sure I didn’t fill past the fill line and making sure I sealed them tight with no excess air in them but somehow they still managed to leak in my freezer and now I have to completely clean my freezer because it is now covered in stickiness. I would have loved for these to work because I tend to make a lot of frozen adult drinks but unfortunately the leaking will keep me from buying this brand again :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessface765

customer_reviews.title: My kids will eat anything out of these bags
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these twice now as I've discovered my children will pretty much eat anything I blend up and freeze in these bags. I have one child who has not voluntarily eaten a piece of fruit or vegetable in years and will devour any number of fruit/veggie combos in the form of a bagged popsicle. Great durability - we've never had any leakages and the funnel works well.
customer_reviews.author: sarahw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fun easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: Frozip bags are AWESOME! The funnel that came with the package was fantastic, perfect size & easy to use. The size of the bags are the perfect size to put frozen mixed drinks in and we will use them for many Different items. The thickness of the plastic is excellent! We purchased them on Tuesday and had them in time to use during the weekend! They shipped so fast! Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimsuekids

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once, but the strawberry popsicles were wonderful. They are easy to fill with the nifty little collapsable funnel that is included. I filled them all the way up to the fill line but think next time I'll put less in--it's a lot for a little kid to eat. Love these and can't wait to try other flavors. Highly recommend as a healthy way to cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Gramzie

customer_reviews.title: Clean pops
customer_reviews.text: These make creating "clean" frozen treats a snap. My wife has been making "clean" food for our family for a couple years now and it was always hard to find a frozen dessert or how she could make one with portion control, these make it real easy. Included is a collapsible funnel that makes filling the sleeves really easy. Go give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought them because I was tired of hunting down the plastic sticks from my old popsicle makers when the kids were done. These are so much easier as they can just be thrown away when done. I love the little funnel that came with it, it makes it so easy to pour the juice into the tubes. I also love that I can add all kinds of healthy ingredients and the kids don’t even know. I made a ton and not a single one leaked.
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no clean up, easy to use! Great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best things I have ever bought. All the other ones want to dip the plastic device in water and cleaning! These are one use you pour any liquid in and your good to go!! Be aware they have the line for a reason so if you pass your running the risk of it leaking. One tip is if you put soda or anything carbonated make sure you fill below the line for extra space because it will expand! FYI the funnel they give you is perfect and necessary
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I actually used these for single use protein shake mixes and they hold up pretty well in ym gym bag, I just wouldn't throw them around too much. I tried them for popsicles and they hold up pretty well, just don't forget the head space at the top or the liquid will expand and overflow as it freezes. By the way, try reducing your juices to more of a syrup for a better popsicle consistency
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It took me back to childhood it TODAY I use this in a healthier way! I blend up watermelon or by berries or combine them with banana and make my own healthier version of a ice. They come with a big funnel to help direct the flow of the liquid into the plastic. But I’m using a Vitamix and the spout of the vitamix fits right into the plastic sleeve. I love it. They give you plenty of sleeves too.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love these things for making "adult pop-pops"...just have to remember which ones are adult and which ones are the kids. I know you can buy pre-made, but love creating my own flavor combinations. They turned out easier to use (fill) than I thought. The first batch I was careful to keep them standing up until I got them in the freezer, the subsequent batches I realized they are not going to leak and let them lay on the counter until I put them in the freezer. They are a hit when camping or having a backyard get together.
customer_reviews.author: LW Camarillo

customer_reviews.title: Love making our own healthy frozen snacks in this heat!
customer_reviews.text: I messed up a batch of plum jelly and just could not make myself add more sugar to make it set so - we looked to make frozen fruit pops. This product is amazing!! not only can you make a bunch but they are also easy to store. We plan to freeze more homemade fruit smoothie products - they are way better and cheaper than anything else we can buy in a market! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the Summer
customer_reviews.text: I saw ads for alcohol ice pops and thought to myself, I can make that for cheaper! So I did. I made Bahama Mama, Tequila Sunrise and Peach Margarita. These popsicle sleeves worked like a charm! Once the ziploc was sealed, nothing leaked or broke. I was the favorite at our Fantasy football draft, these flew out of the freezer like hotcakes. Now I'm being asked to make more and start distributing.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Came as Described
customer_reviews.text: The bags were easy to fill and the provided funnel made all the difference. The fill line was at the exact point it should be, and the zipper seal actually worked. The packaging was not what I was expecting, but the product was still great. The right amount of bags cake, and these are much easier to use than ice pop molds we have tried in the past. The bags aren’t reusable but that wasn’t our intention when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bellino

customer_reviews.title: I blew air in to open them up and they worked great. They are smaller than the ones bought in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only made a dozen for a first time use. I blew air in to open them up and they worked great. They are smaller than the ones bought in the stores, but I guess that helps with portion control. They are for me, not kids. I just blend up fresh fruit with a little bit of water to pour. They are great when I come inside after being out the hot Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: John Stigers

customer_reviews.title: Tubes fine, funnel is a waste.
customer_reviews.text: The included funnel, does not work great. Really, only that last little bit fits into the tube, and pops back out again really easily. Also, we're all using these for squishy things, right? You don't want to try to hold a squishy funnel and a bag in one hand, while pouring with the other. Tried it, cleaned up the mess, tried it again, chucked the squishy funnel and just used a regular hard funnel. Result!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love freeze pops but they're so full of artificial colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim. My kids love freeze pops but they're so full of artificial colors, flavors, and sugars so this seemed like a good alternative. Some reviews said their bags leaked and had holes...mine did not. They're perfect! The bags are easy to fill thanks to the funnel but it would have been a bit awkward to try to hold the funnel and bag and pour the liquid without help from my 7 year old. My kids love the freeze pops they made so much we made yogurt ones for breakfasts, too. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa J Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making adult freezer pops
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make freezer pops in adult flavors. The funnel that comes with the set is awesome. It folds up completely. I made 2 batches of pops, one with pina colada and one with mudslides. I added mashed banana which helped it set up better since the alcohol doesn't freeze. The wine ones were less successful. May work better with Sangria since there will be fruit juice to help them set. They were a big hit and I will be doing more flavors once it warms up again. I stood the bags up in a glass to help fill and all of them were perfect, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome but
customer_reviews.text: We freeze pure juices for healthier popsicles. To get added protein, I fill some with protein shakes and freeze. To keep my wine cold, I make wine popsicles and put them in my glass so it doesn't get watered down as they melt. Price is high as you're simply paying for novelty. Looking for food grade zipper bags to replace these when they run out.
customer_reviews.author: JustCampin

customer_reviews.title: OMG - AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Hello, This is such an amazing product. We love it, thank you. My kids are in sports and we (parents) need to raise money and I had been looking for ways to make frozen popsicles. When searching this item came up and we decided to order. OMG so much better than the cups. I was using cups then covering them with clear plastic wrap then making a small incision w/a knife to place a popsicle stick in it. This time the time spent was extremely less and less messy. I will be using for kids snacks as well. Absolutely recommend. NO leaks!
customer_reviews.author: alondra mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a great idea, and it well could be except for a few flaws. We have found that they would definitely be better if the plastic was thicker, these are relatively flimsy making them hard to use once frozen. The plastic sticks to its self so that sucking out the contents becomes annoying. We ended up using straws which defeated their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C. Surowiec

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and won't zip
customer_reviews.text: These bags arrived promptly and appeared to be in good condition. I later discovered that half of them won't zip (the zippers aren't aligned properly to close the bags), and many of them have weak or incomplete side seams, so they leak when you try to fill them. The enclosed funnel is a great tool and was very useful. I wish I had returned them when the window was still open. I'm really disappointed and will have to throw out at least half of them away. I now wish I would have purchased silicone ones that I could reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist Amy

customer_reviews.title: Genius!!
customer_reviews.text: Genius!! I wanted to make our own Pedialyte popsicles when my son was sick and I actually read the ingredients on their freezer pops (red 40 & blue dyes!?!) These were so easy to use and now we make our own Pedia pops with the clear Pedialyte!
customer_reviews.author: Heleigh

customer_reviews.title: So many options!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We’ve made so many different popsicles with them. I place them upright in a large mouth mason jar while they freeze. I’m halfway through the package and have not had any leaks or anything. My only suggestion would be to rip or cut off the ziplock part when it’s time to eat, otherwise it can cut the corner of your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bain

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly when used as directed
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. No leaks when frozen upright and filled just to the marked fill line. Held more fruit puree than I expected so I might try the smaller ones for young children. The cherry popsicles were a hit on our extended family beach vacation. I piped the puree into the bags rather than use the funnel since my filling was very thick. A second set of hands was very helpful. The funnel will be useful with more liquid fillings.
customer_reviews.author: coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for a boat trip for adult freezer pops ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a boat trip for adult freezer pops. Made 3 kinds of different drinks with top shelf liquor. When I put them in Tupperware container, and set aside while I made some more, the bags I started filling, had holes in the corner, I then looked in the Tupperware and found 1/2 empty ziploc bags floating in a sea of mixed up top shelf liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at seam, leaked, didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.text: These leaked when I used them even after I was very careful making sure they were properly sealed in the freezer and carefully handled when I took them out. I noticed the leak was coming from a tear in the seam. This product was a nice idea but they need a thicker plastic. It was a waste of money for us sadly. We won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesska

customer_reviews.title: They could be sturdier, but still a good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make wine popsicles. They are expensive to buy and stores don't sell them where I live. The bags could be a little sturdier. I did have a few leak and a few break. The included funnel worked nicely and I loved that it collapses down. It was a good value. All in all, I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: My kids actually think they are eating regular popsicles
customer_reviews.text: These popsicle sleeves are a game changer. My kids will eat a whole box of popsicles and being able to make smoothie type popsicles that are healthy has been a win for them and me. Super easy to fill and close. Very durable and easy to eat out of. The kids have no idea how much "healthier" they are eating and I can get some decent food in them!
customer_reviews.author: MMW

customer_reviews.title: Ok why didn’t I get these earlier??!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for making your own ice pops. Comes with a funnel so it’s easy to fill also they don’t leak. I have had them in the freezer both upright and laying flat - no leaks. There were no issues when opening them after freezing. Totally a great purchase - for both adult ice pops 😁 and kids pops!! I wish I did this earlier in the summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed, in myself for choosing these after reading the reviews saying they leak. THEY ABSOLUTELY DO. I made my son three smoothie yogurts and filled them only to the fill line, pressed the air out and froze them flat. I took one out the next morning, put it in his lunchbox, and by 11:30 that morning it had leaked all over his lunchbox. I cant even return the item. I love the funnel, but I'll never buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed for Homemade Pops!
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy to use and clean funnel, and the perfectly sized popsicle pouches. I was so excited that I immediately opened the package to start using them. I'm going to let my pops freeze overnight, but it's already been so much easier than makeshifting with baggies in the meantime. They're easy to use and were delivered in less than 24 hours; what more could you want these days?
customer_reviews.author: RCcola

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are built like budget zipper bags. The first use I filled the bags placed them on a cookie sheet and put them in them freezer. I made sure that they zipped all of the way across before laying them down on the sheet. When I checked on the bags after a few hours all had leaked. I will not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disposable popsicle bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very sturdy and easy to use. They come with their own funnel which helps put any kind of liquid in them. I made frozen yogurt treats and the bags held up perfectly. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rose W. Muccio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, does that they claim to do.
customer_reviews.text: We were 100% satisfied with this product. They were easy to fill with the appropriate funnel. We used just straight Organic Orange Juice / Lemonade for our kids and that way they had zero artificial ingredients for a nice cool treat. Would be nice for making boozy pops for the adults later as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to fill and the fill line is awesome. Love the zip top, which is easy for my boys to open and enjoy. I put the bag in a glass to help with filling while I held the top open.
customer_reviews.author: JMcHose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great bags and so easy for making custom frozen pops. The plastic collapsible funnel works great, but it was also easy to simply hold the zip by the top corners and pour into the bag. I have made several batches of different freezer pops now with these bags and they are perfect! Just bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Zip closures do NOT work
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving bad reviews but I wish someone else had warned me not to buy these. The closure does not work on the mass majority of these so I had to stand them up in cups to freeze, I’m not even sure that will work. I’m kind of shocked at the poor quality I don’t know how these got so many good reviews, unless I just happened to get the one package with all broken/mismatched closure zips. I hate to say I’ll never buy these again, and I certainly wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this for your kids as treats while sneaking in the healthy good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found these a long time ago. I fill them with low sugar, organic juice to replace the unhealthy Popsicles I've been buying to give as treats to my kids. I also make smoothies with fruit and vegetables they wouldn't touch, but they love eating them as "ice cream". Sneak the good stuff in!
customer_reviews.author: The Allen Family

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make BOOZEY popsicles. I read on pinterest and wanted to try them so I ordered the bags. They came the next day!!!! I made the frozen banana dacquiri and some pina coladas. The bags are quality and it even came with a funnel to make pouring easy. I love this product and I'm going to buy more. Also on a sidenote, my friend came to visit me and she has a brand new baby. She saw the bags and decided to use them for pumped breastmilk storage. They are absolutely ideal for that. She is ordering them as well. Thank you for such a great product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Cally Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Leaked, Mess Everywhere, Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bags leaked as soon as they were out of the freezer. The Ziploc end stayed intact mostly but the other end starting leaking juice everywhere. Also, it became very clear that the popsicle inside the bag was too big to pass through the Ziploc opening, rendering my toddler VERY frustrated that he couldn't get to his popsicle. I went from giving my child a healthier version of a treat he loves and feeling like mom of the day to being very frustrated, flustered, and anxious over the mess these bags created. I should've gone with a different brand that was recommended. I'd like to see if this company fulfills their promise of "100% money back guarantee".
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Harris

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy any other popsicles!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME. I feel like traditional popsicles are a pain, but these were SO easy! Easy to fill, easy to freeze. They are sturdy when you are actually eating them. My toddler can eat them no problem. And the zip closure is thick! It will take us a while to get though 125, but when we do, I will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: KaitF

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for our sports team! We have some weekends with double header games at 98 degree weather. It gets hot! I have used these to make electrolyte Popsicles and keep the kids hydrated! They LOVE how easy they are to open. No Scissors or little pieces of plastic all over. To fill simply use the included rubber funnel. SUPER EASY! I have also found other uses, I froze some chicken broth for a quick packet of seasonings. GREAT PRODUCT! I will be buying more once I get through my current stock.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the bags leak
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product despite some warnings from reviewers that the plastic had failed and some had leaked. Unfortunately, that's exactly what happened to mine, so I guess I have no one to blame but myself. I only tried a couple bags, so I'll try more, but will probably opt for a more expensive, higher rated product next time. Filling the bags was easy enough with the funnel provided. Hopefully, they'll start producing a better quality bag, until then, I'll be on the hunt for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little freeze pops!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as pictured. It is easy to use for the most part. It’s a little tricky trying to hold the popsicle bag and little funnel while trying to pour something inside, I ended up using a champagne flute to help. It’s also a little smaller than regular freeze pops, but they were perfect for what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K Banos

customer_reviews.title: Fill them over a sink or container
customer_reviews.text: I like them for their compact ability for smaller freezers. Unfortunately, some of them had holes. I used them to make homemade electrolyte pops for my friend who had cancer. Luckily I was using containers & measuring cups when making them. The ingredients I used weren’t cheap & if I lost more in the defective sleeves I’d have been less kind in my review.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased big, smoothie bags from this brand And that material is thicker than these. Just filled the pop sickle bags today so we will see how easy they are to use once we go to eat them. I put them inside a large zip loc bags since other reviews said they leak. So far I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dway

customer_reviews.title: Do not overfill. Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they’d be longer so I was a little concerned about the length of them. What I quickly realized is it’s wider than the average sleeve. I used my Vitamix and made go-gurts and popsicles and they are fabulous! No leaks so far, easy to use, I used the funnel that came with the sleeves. Very easy clean up. I will keep these on hand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: L.Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Great option for homemade popsicles
customer_reviews.text: I have XC runners. My daughter and her friends love to have those horrible popsicles you buy in the store with high-fructose corn syrup. I bought these and some flavored electrolyte drink mix. A 20 oz drink mix packet makes five popsicles. Easy to pour into, easy to seal. Lay them flat when freezing. They work really well. I recommend if you are looking to make a healthier popsicle than what you can buy in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: RomanceFiend

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: The package was left on a landscape light so half of them melted together but that was UPS fault. The remaining bags work well, they hold the liquid and the closure system is easy to use. I appreciate the collapsible funnel that was included as well, it helps to fill the bags.
customer_reviews.author: gh0st

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews about them being flimsy, dirty, and that they leaked. I had ZERO issues like this. They are a little thin but for the price, that doesn't matter to me at all. They didn't tear or split, were relatively easy to fill (thanks to the convenient funnel that comes with it), and zipped up just fine. I made adult "boozy pops" for the beach that included diced fruit and the bags even held the fruit just fine. A win for me!
customer_reviews.author: mama3sc

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make adult popsicles for a birthday party and I loved them! I thought they would be messy to use but nope, the funnel makes it super easy. I made about 40 and not one leaked. I layered them in a baking sheet before freezing to keep shape so the bottom layer took longer to freeze. These were so fun I'm looking for my next "adult" recipe to try!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bags are sturdy and seal good. Love the little funnel that came with the bag. I puréed fresh fruit to make me some homemade ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: They're basically skinny ziplock baggies! What a neat idea. Fill to the white fill line and seal. Stick in the freezer and a few hours later, your popsicles are ready. Just make sure they're sealed before you lay them down anywhere. Lesson learned! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Torkkola

customer_reviews.title: Boozy pops for the win
customer_reviews.text: We used these for boozy pops at a party and they were a huge hit!!! My only complaint is that about 30 of them were messed up. The ziplock was off and they couldn’t be closed so we had to toss a big chunk of our pack. Still a fun buy tho, next time I’ll order a couple packs to make up for defective ones.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Make your own healthy pops
customer_reviews.text: I love pomegranate popsicles and I couldn’t find them locally so I make my own with these pouches. Funnel is great and needed to easily fill the tubes. I also made some adult version pops with papaya, oj, and vodka. Both freeze well and store with no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: judy szpak

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, easy, good value, healthy,
customer_reviews.text: Made two batches of pinaple kiwi freeze pops. Batch 1 = juice. 2nd batch lots of pulp 2 teaspoon and with after jucing fruit- water rince -2 cups of water thu juicer. Funnel works great. Making delicious freeze pops with juicer leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: akaWEDGE

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for yogurt for my son who is allergic to dairy and therefore cannot eat the regular go-gurts. I used these to pour in a silk yogurt so he could take it to school. It took a while to get it all in and was a little messy but he was so happy he could take yogurt like the other kids and so it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product so far after filling approximately 24 bags. The first one I filled with water and sealed to see if any leakage would be present, and it was fine. I continued on filling the bags with a boozey ice pop recipe I’d found online and each held perfectly. Just remember to stay organized and clean as you go for your own sake (regardless of what you fill them with). The bags themselves are very light and simple and no more complex than a sandwich bag. Plus, I don’t think they with give you those nasty cuts on the corners of your mouth that the store bought pops tend to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to hold liquids
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try these since my mom used to make ice candies when I was a kid. These are not good whatsoever. I tried 3 different batches. They go in just fine, but after you freeze them, it leaks everywhere. I would not recommend wasting your money or your time on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for homemade yogurt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put homemade yogurt in for my kids lunches. They are a little hard to fill even with funnel because the yogurt is on the thicker side. The bags sealed well and didn't have an issues with leaks or holes in the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McMeekan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, need to get the hang of using them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make healthy freezer fruit and yogurt snacks. My first try with funneling a yogurt smoothie into a bag was unsuccessful. The yogurt was too thick to use the funnel and I couldn't figure out how to get the bag to stay upright while pouring smoothie into it. Hopefully if I liquify my smoothie more these will be easier to use. I love the idea of being able to make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the worse popsicle bags I purchased 2 set so totally 400 bags. They are extremely hard to open and with some once they were closed you can re open them! I spent more time trying to open each one then I did pouting the mixture in the bag! I needed to make 500 popsicles for an event and I've wasted valuable time fighting with these bags!!! Don't order!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill.
customer_reviews.text: I make ices for my son. These work perfectly. Easy to fill because it comes with a funnel. Not reusable. I gave it a 4 star for sturdiness because once they are frozen they snap in half very very easily. Make sure that nothing is ontop of them in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: moshe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these bags (8"x2") with no excess plastic along the sides which can cut a little one's mouth. The plastic is soft yet durable. Out of a few hundred of these, only a handful leaked at the bottom (seemed to be from one particular package) after coming out of the freezer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gypsygirl

customer_reviews.title: ... acai juice - in covered container - but with easy release. These are exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to freeze acai juice - in covered container - but with easy release. These are exactly what I needed. After filling place them up-right in a plastic cup or container until frozen - then I place about a dozen in a large zip-lock bags.. To use - run them under water for a few seconds. .The zip lock opens easy - .the contents slide right out - just like a freezer pop. Frozen juice ready for my acai bowls every morning. The amount each bag holds is perfect (about 1/2 cup).. Haven't used the funnel - I pour juice from a measuring cup. .
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it. Just buy them! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use and fill! The picture I included is of applesauce, however I plan on using them for yogurt and popsicles too! Such a money saver, and you know exactly what your eating because you made them! A healthy easy way to snack is the absolute best when you have a growing family!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisDen

customer_reviews.title: Use a jersey press with a nossel and a wide enough loading mouth to fill.
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered today and very timely as I had just started making applesauce. Putting applesauce in these tubes was not an easy feat. I tried the Gatorade bottle style I tried them frosting tube style I’ve made a couple different other things but what work the best was actually a cookie press that I modified a canning lid with a hole. If my jerky press was bigger mouthed for the canning funnel to put in and fill I would of used it as it had a nossel to insert in the bag. Took me 2 hours to fill 125 bags. But oh so yummy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for thicker foods like pudding!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make pudding and yogurt pops with these bags. I wasn't sure if I would be able to fill the bags with the funnel since instant pudding is fairly thick. Sure enough, instant pudding thickens too fast to get it through the funnel and other methods I tried were too messy. I haven't tried yogurt yet, but unless I thin it out I don't think it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Mom

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizing mask for hair is very good, it is not cool to use it a lot because it leaves the hair more oily. But when used in the right way it perfectly moisturizes the hair and leaves the hair with a very good smell. I indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: These ate not too difficult to fill, but once frozen it is hard to get to the frozen contents. Also the was difficult to hold because of the frozen contents and no insulation. I tried several times but ended up ordering a silicone pop mold instead.
customer_reviews.author: rhodentme

customer_reviews.title: Came without spout!
customer_reviews.text: I hope the seller reads this- the package came split open in the amazon envelope plastic bags everywhere and WITHOUT THE SPOUT! Really defeats the purpose! I would like a refund at this point I have no idea how to get anything in these tiny bags without the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Ah lak it alot!
customer_reviews.text: I Loved these, pretty easy to use and good size, just what I was looking for (by the way I made some "Mangoneada" ice popsicles (mango, chamoy & tajin) and banana & yogurt.... they were delishh.... I definetly recommend them to anybody :)
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product and haven't had any leakage or broken ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and haven't had any leakage or broken bag problems. I was very happy to hear about the great customer service provided to the people who did have some issues. I found this to be a fun way to use the syrups I had left over from the snow cone machine I rented last year. I put the syrup to the half way point from the bottom of bag and the fill line and then put water in to the fill line. I also tried putting in a couple of grapes with the grape flavored one and it worked too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every bag had a hole in it, right above ...
customer_reviews.text: Every bag had a hole in it, right above the fill line. When laying them down to freeze, the liquid poured out.
customer_reviews.author: Tericakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect popsicles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make watermelon popsicles and they turned out to be amazing! These disposable popsicle bags are perfect for making homemade popsicles! Super easy to fill them using the funnel and less cleanup! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Greek yogurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put Greek yogurt in. Does not work. Don't buy them for thicker substances. Liquid probably works best, I don't know because that is not what I bought them for. Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Laew

customer_reviews.title: Makes great popsicles, but plastic bags are thin.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson only will eat cherry, so we decided to make our own. Everything worked well, but the plastic bags are thin. It is not hard to get a hole in the bag somewhere when eating, so be careful or you may have a drippy mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seams leak, but there currently isn’t a better option on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These are the best on Amazon, unfortunately they aren’t very good quality! after buying 6 boxes and making almost 1000 popsicles, I’d say 1 in 5 WILL LEAK from side or bottom seams, not much but enough they make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: xsc19

product_meta.title: Frozip 125 Disposable Ice Popsicle Mold Bags| BPA Free Freezer Tubes With Zip Seals | For Healthy Snacks, Yogurt Sticks, Juice & Fruit Smoothies, Ice Candy Pops| Comes With A Funnel (8x2")
product_meta.description:
Take Snack & Treat Making To A Whole Other Level With Frozip Popsicle Bags! 

Are your kids tired of all those same old snacks? 

Want to avoid eating treats that are packed with calories? 

Looking for disposable mold bags that can be effectively sealed? 

If so, then you should keep on reading. We have the most resilient popsicle bags designed for you. 

Make snacking fun again, facilitate storage and pleasantly surprise your kids the next time they are craving for something delicious. 

Fill In, Zip & Freeze – You Are One Step Closer To The Healthiest Snack Of Your Life With Frozip Popsicle Bags! 

Who said snacking has to be boring, right? 

With the help of these disposable freezer bags, you can prepare tasty snacks full of vitamins, antioxidants, proteins, and energy. 

Add fruit, chopped vegetables, seeds, candy, yogurt, granola, oat, dark chocolate, honey, nuts and pretty much anything that comes to mind. 

Make your own popsicles for birthday parties, pool getaways and BBQ gatherings, camping trips, boat rides, picnics, beach excursions, and more. 

Say no to sugar loaded snacks and ready-made popsicles. 

Here’s Why These Disposable Popsicle Bags Are The Right Ones For You: 

 Premium quality popsicle bags. Large size 8x2'' for endless fun. 


 Durable, side reinforced and zip sealed mold bags. 


 BPA free, non-toxic plastic bags. Safe and easy to use! 


 No tearing, no leaking, no spilling, no knot making. No more worries. 


 Make DIY snacks, otter pops, ice candy tubes, juice pops, smoothies, fruit salads, frozen yogurt sticks, ice cream delies, popsicles icicles and others. 


 Package includes 125 disposable popsicle mold bags with a funnel. 


What are you waiting for? Get yours today, while supplies last! 

Scroll Up & Click Add To Cart Now!
feature_bullets: ➢ PREPARE HEALTHY & YUMMY TREATS: Worrying about your kid’s poor snacking habits? If so, then our 125 disposable popsicle bags are here for you. Prepare the most delicious and healthiest snacks for your little ones starting from today. Experiment with ingredients, flavors and colors. You and your children are going to love them.

➢ SNACK ON THE GO: If you are running errands or are always on the move, these freezer tube bags will be a time and energy saviour. Chop the fruit, prepare the smoothies, add any ingredients you want, fill the bags and store. Keep in the freezer and snack on the spot. Stop wasting your precious time and spend more quality time with your beloved ones.

➢ 100% SAFE POPSICLE TUBES: Made with your best interest at heart, these disposable mold bags are 100% BPA and Phthalates free. They are non-toxic and comply with the safety regulations of the USDA Certified Food Grade and Freezer Product. No more worries about cheaply made and unsafe ice popsicle bags. You and your kids are safe!

➢ NO SPILLING, NO MESS: These disposable popsicle bags can be zip sealed for your extra convenience. Forget about spilling, messy freezers and sticky backpacks. Enjoy the healthiest homemade snack popsicles no matter where you go. Our bags can hold either thick or liquid form fluids. Just lay them flat in the freezer, wait for a few hours and taste!

➢ GET THESE POPSICLE BAGS & FUNNEL RISK FREE: Since your satisfaction is our top priority, this product is backed by our 100% money back guarantee policy. It comes along with a funnel to make pouring a breeze. Make delicious yogurt sticks, fruit and vegetable pops, iced popsicles, otter pops, candy treats, party favors, and so much more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,199 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
